verses.name: Luke 21:36
verses.text: Watch ye therefore, and pray always, that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass, and to stand before the Son of man.

verses.name: Luke 21:37
verses.text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple; and at night he went out, and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives.

verses.name: Luke 21:38
verses.text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple, for to hear him.
